Lde/ecspride/LocationLeak2;->onLocationC: This method retrieves the latitude and longitude from a Location object passed as an argument (v6), converts them to strings, and stores these string representations in member variables of the class instance represented by v5.
Lde/ecspride/LocationLeak2;->onResume:(): The method 'onResume' in class 'de/ecspride/LocationLeak2' involves retrieving and logging user-specific location information (latitude and longitude) from the instance variables of the same object, then creating and displaying Toast messages with this data. The latitude and longitude values are obtained from fields within the same class instance, which might be considered sensitive if they are directly tied to a user's physical location.
